briefTitle: Co-administration of Propofol and Remifentanil for Lumbar Puncture in Children
officialTitle: Co-administration of Propofol and Remifentanil for Lumbar Puncture in Children: Evaluation of Two Dose Combinations
summary: The objective of this study is to compare intraoperative and recovery parameters in patients who receive two different dose combinations of propofol and remifentanil in patients undergoing a lumbar puncture.

primaryOutcome.timeFrame: This outcome was measured for the duration of the procedure (lumbar puncture).
